website_summaries.verdict: The fit and the style of the Trainfusion Nine 2.0 LMT managed to meet the expectations of many consumers. Users also appreciated its lightweight nature and price. However, some people were unhappy with the quality of the footwear. Still, it was the shoe of choice for many training enthusiasts because of the comfort and support that it offered.
pros: A majority of owners said that the Reebok Trainfusion Nine 2.0 LMT was comfortable
A lot of users claimed that the size and the fit were perfect for them
The style of the trainer was adored by plenty of consumers
Many buyers stated that the footwear offered great value for its price
The lightweight nature of the shoe pleased several people
A good number of fitness enthusiasts recommended using the trainer for indoor training because it felt supportive on the ankles and during lateral movements
The product seemed durable and made from high-quality materials, according to some testers
cons: The quality of the footwear disappointed many reviewers
it had structural issues such as outsole detaching or deteriorating and stitches unraveling
This shoe was stiff in some areas which made it uncomfortable to use for a small group of wearers
A few gym-goers wished that the outsole did not slip easily
The lack of arch support caused foot and leg pain, according to a couple of individuals

customer_reviews.title: a good all-purpose running/walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these for running on concrete, mainly, in the city. They're comfortable and sturdy, and the color is really nice. They would probably be too heavy for speed running or marathons, but for 4-5 mile runs they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: magicD

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price, true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for $35 shoes, comfortable, true to size, light, the insole is soft. They definitely feel different from a more expensive comparable shoe from Nike for instance, but for my use it's fine. Perhaps don't run a marathon in these, otherwise theyre great shoes
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as other reeboks
customer_reviews.text: I previously wore an older pair of reeboks to school everyday with the same cushion insoles these shoes have the same insoles, but it seems the actual shoe is a lot stiffer and more firm, the back of the shoe (that rides up on your ankle) is very rough and rigid, the sole itself feels too stiff and doesn't compress properly. Needless to say I've already returned this pair and am looking elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Ali AL-Qudsi

customer_reviews.title: pretty shoe. I wish the inner edge around the ...
customer_reviews.text: pretty shoe. I wish the inner edge around the lace compartment had a secure finish, I know for a fact the fiber will start roughening up and threads will start to show, I will seal it with a clear nail polish before it gets to that stage
customer_reviews.author: afj

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super light and comfortable. Easy to work in, my feet never really hurt from work in these. They aren't so durable in my opinion though, but these were made for running, not working.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Depends really upon what you use them for...
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and super comfy and light. The traction is a little weak, though. This wouldn't be an issue so much, but I bought them for work where this is an important quality for a shoe to have.
customer_reviews.author: K. Purdy

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes. They're super light and offer perfect stability ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. They're super light and offer perfect stability and support for my cardio kickboxing and weightlifting classes. I've been using them a 4-5 times a week for about three months now, and they've held up perfectly. Theyre comfortable enough that I'm considering a second pair to wear out and about as well!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bencardino Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Yourflex brand are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not as comfortable as the yourflex Reebok’s but it’s still a pretty good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, great value, light weight but comfortable, great insoles, very cushiony
customer_reviews.author: M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size, good quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fits true to size. The design and colors on shoe were a big hit with my son.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: It stated that this is a men's shoe, so ...
customer_reviews.text: It stated that this is a men's shoe, so I ordered accordingly. It's a women's shoe and should've ordered women's sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Has memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they have memory foam insoles. I have to stand all day at work.
customer_reviews.author: roadtripboy

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable and at a great price $35.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable and at a great price $35. I will buy again ... if this model is still around in 4 to 6 months ..oh and if it stands up to light jogging and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Look great, fit well on a narrow foot, and memory foam held up fine during first run (pavement). The sole is a little stiffer than last pair, but will break in a little over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor service.
customer_reviews.text: It was described as a men’s trainer shoe but it came in as a women’s trainer shoe. So yeah the size was too small. The shoe company hasn’t made it right yet. Poor service.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly light! Better than expected. Would give 6 stars if I could. Haven't tried them on a super long walk yet, but 2 full days of normal wear in HOT weather and they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J & D

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly resilient!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were so cheap, yet they lasted for like six months and were comfy the whole time! I wasn't expecting shoes this cheap to last, but they did. And I was using these everyday, walking around campus for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes, foot breathes, well supports the leg. Also, for a long walk does not rub.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! Comfortable. Durable. Great gym shoes or everyday walking shoes. They breath and look Great!

customer_reviews.title: Great show
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend along with 2 others. And he wears these the most. He loves them and I love the way they look. You can't beat that price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: this is my Reebok
customer_reviews.text: I use this pair of Reeboks for casual for walking comfortable like price range. PS if there were more than two price range 28 to 35 what's free ship I would buy more I am man on disability and budget JB
customer_reviews.author: J.B I am recommending to other buyers and people that don't mind making other people laugh this product will do it

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fit as expected. I like the look of them.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much
customer_reviews.text: So cute! And the insole is made with memory foam so it's very comfy. Love it so much!! I wear it to the gym and so far it fits well.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product
customer_reviews.text: This pair was great. I love them. However, I bought a pair in grey and white, those seemed defective. The left was wider than the right.

customer_reviews.title: It says these are men's shoes, but the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: It says these are men's shoes, but the ones I received were for women, which may explain why they were also too small.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Great buy. Reebok has been my choice for cleats and sneakers for years because they perform and last like $150+ shoes without costing so much. Will buy these again.

customer_reviews.title: Style is nice and it's comfortable for my kickboxing class
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too big. Style is nice and it's comfortable for my kickboxing class.

customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandson and he likes them a lot. Comfy and lightweight, he wears them all the time

customer_reviews.title: Feels like wearing slippers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes! Quite comfortable and resistant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes! Quite comfortable and resistant, but at the same time casual and fit for any occasion. I highly recommend them!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 8 for my wife. She loves it and she has no complaints on them.

customer_reviews.title: Really great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the size of this shoe. Fits perfectly! I also love the memory foam padding.

customer_reviews.text: They are really nice shoes but the run very large! I had to return them 🙁

customer_reviews.text: For the price, the quality and comfort you get are undeniable. The look is not so good but I am okay with that

customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this insole will hold up to exercise or continued use for very long.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes Not for running they are more of a non ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes Not for running they are more of a non athletic shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Feel like I am walking on air all day wear thank you
customer_reviews.text: I love them feels like I am walking on air

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes as fitted as expected. Comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elie

customer_reviews.title: amazing shoe design, nice, comfortable, everything!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looooooooooove this shoe!!!!! soooooooo comfortable!!!!! very convenient too, I thought all shoe companies were out to get my ankles and take my comfort away from me for trying to look stylish AND having a comfortable footwear, but I realized that not every shoe company is Reebok. lol, I just noticed this was a men's shoe. Im a woman btw, but this fits completely my size and contours to my foot in the sole. I dont want to wear any other shoe ever!!! besides going barefoot, this is the shoe to get!!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got what I paid for. Donated them after two uses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As cheap looking as the price suggests
customer_reviews.text: I was wary of these sneakers because of the low price, but I decided to give them a shot based on reviews indicating that they are much nicer than the price implies. My first instinct was correct, however. These sneakers look and feel very cheap, like something you would find on rollback at Walmart. They weigh so little you'd think they were made out of styrofoam. I suggest spending another $20 for something a little more durable and of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: CA472

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but they are cute.
customer_reviews.text: They look cute and it seems they have cushionbut unfortunately, they don't. They have a nice memory foam insole but it is like stepping on a hardwood floor. Not good for working out. They also have little to no grip of the soles, which again is not ideal.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable, light yet sturdy. Wore them four the first time at a University of Cincinnati basket ball game in Orlando Fluoride. Where the "CATS", lost to the University of Central Florida, once of only 5 games lost in the 2016/2017 season! The BlackBerry shoe withe red laces matched the team colors of the Cincinnati Bearcats!!! Love these shoes, and priced very well!

customer_reviews.title: She wasn't happy at all

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to a more tight fitting toe box so at first the toe box felt too roomy but after wearing them a few times I find them very comfortable. No pinching or end hitting my toes. No rubbing anywhere from the first wear. I'm very happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product at a great price! Smooth transaction. I highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for sometime now and they are very comfortable and light. Good for the price.

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Trainfusion Nine 2.0 LMT Sneaker
product_meta.description: These Train Fusion Nine 2.0 shoes provide phenomenal performance and comfort. The mesh upper means adequate airflow, and the DMX ride cushioning moves air underfoot so shock absorption happens just where it's needed.
